snippet: The Italian culture minister says he will free up nearly $3 million for Pompeii, where structures were damaged after heavy rains.
abstract: The Italian culture minister says he will free up nearly $3 million for Pompeii, where structures were damaged after heavy rains.

headline.main: Italy Moves to Speed Up Maintenance at Pompeii After Collapses
headline.print_headline: Italy Moves to Speed Up Maintenance at Pompeii
